title: Chill Out with Brandon Semenuk’s Latest Video – In The Know
content:
We already know that Brandon Semenuk makes the impossible look way too easy on his bike. Now you can add making it feel incredibly zen as well. Back in the ultimate freeride playground of Utah, In The Know is another masterpiece of mind-blowing riding, incredible scenery, and creative photography with a laid-back sound track.

From SRAM:

Freeride mountain biking has a few different proving grounds dictated by extreme terrain and rider creativity. Utah might be the most legendary of them all. For the last 25 years riders have been making this pilgrimage to prove what they are capable of creating, this is a path Brandon has walked many times. Always seeking a new edge, a new way to express himself, Brandon has relied on Utah as a partner in this journey, and the results always left us wondering what more there is to find out there in the mesas.

The post Chill Out with Brandon Semenuk’s Latest Video – In The Know appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
